code: import{ActionTypes}from"../constants/action-types";export var setMovies=function setMovies(movies){return{type:ActionTypes.SET_MOVIES,payload:movies};};export var selectedMovie=function selectedMovie(movie){return{type:ActionTypes.SELECTED_MOVIE,payload:movie};};export var movieCast=function movieCast(movie){return{type:ActionTypes.MOVIE_CAST,payload:movie};};
